timeline.bodyText: Git is seeing these as delete / add which makes it harder to review.  If possible, it's better to rename and move classes in a git aware fashion so it can track the deltas.  It's possible that git just isn't able to do this...

timeline.author: fil512

timeline.bodyText: Nitpick: This test is misleading.  It's not testing transitivity.  It's just testing that three identical resources are all equal to each other.  It doesn't do anything beyond testing that assertTrue(cut.test(myPositiveTest1, myPositiveTest2));
timeline.author: fil512

timeline.bodyText: This is really nice!  Will be interesting to see how it evolves as we add survivability rules!
timeline.author: fil512
